Ergh . . .

The republican party is all kinds of stupid strategy wise; guess who wants to run for president again?  Perry.

What's even more stupid is who else they have lined up; they're pushing for Romney to run again, Bush's brother is going to run and they have a whole assortment of unelectable individuals all lined up in a row.

Have I ever told you the definition of insanity?

topics.body:
Yesterday at school, some (female) friends of mine asked me to call out some students in a class to meet them due to sport activity reasons. 
I called them and also said the name of the girls that called them. 
The girls got mad at me and stormed off. 

I started pointing at them behind their back so that the class could see them.
